note.p: Burial: The Sheffield family burial-place at Fletching, Sussex
Education: Magdalen College, Oxford; private study in Lausanne
Career: MP for Liskeard (1774); MP for Lymington; published first volume of "Decline and Fall" (1776) and finished the work in 1788
References: W Johnson, 'Edward Gibbon and George Grote: A Bicentenary in Common' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 221-226, plate
Bernard Bailyn, '1776: The British Dimension' in NR 1976-7 vol 31 pp 179-199
John Thomas, 'Josiah Wedgwood's Portrait Medallions of Fellows of the Royal Society' in NR 1963 vol 18 pp 45-53, plate
W P Griffith and P J T Morris, 'Charles Hatchett FRS (1765 - 1847), chemist and discoverer of niobium' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 299 - 316
